p: The entire world is anxiously watching as COVID-19, a disease caused by the SARS-CoV-2 virus, spreads from country to country, following modern travel routes. It was first reported to the WHO Country Office in China on 31 December 2019 ( https://www.who.int/emergencies/diseases/novel-coronavirus-2019/events-as-they-happen). After that, it inevitably crossed the country’s boundaries, and has become a global pandemic ( WHO 2020b).
